message.content: This question requires knowledge about using daylight as a source of power. Option (B) is unrelated to using daylight as a power source. Option (C) refers to a type of architectural feature and not directly related to using daylight as a power source. Option (D) refers to a concept unrelated to using daylight as a power source.

Option (C) is also unrelated, as metal eaves are typically used to direct rainwater away from a building. Option (D) is irrelevant, as play streets have no connection to harnessing sunlight for power.
